item.title: Wirex Launches Free Bitcoin Virtual Debit Card
item.description:
Wirex Launches Free Bitcoin Virtual Debit Card

Wirex gets it. Cryptos are only as valuable as the accompanying level of usability. Is this what mass adoption of bitcoin looks like? UK-based group Wirex is now offering a free virtual debit card through its pre-existing app.

item.title: Bitcoin wallet provider iPayYou adds "Pay-by-Twitter" feature
item.description:
Bitcoin wallet provider iPayYou adds "Pay-by-Twitter" feature

Bitcoin wallet provider iPayYou, Inc. has launched a new "Pay-by-Twitter" feature that allows users to make peer-to-peer payments on Twitter. iPayYou is claimed to be the first bitcoin wallet that enables Twitter's 310 million monthly users to make peer-to-peer payments over Twitter with payments being made by simply entering a recipient's Twitter account name instead of an email of bitcoin.

item.title: Could an Artificial Intelligence use the blockchain as a medium for its memory?
item.description:
Could an Artificial Intelligence use the blockchain as a medium for its memory?

It depends on the type of AI being built. I think there are few key things to consider. 1. A blockchain is meant to store time series data (transactions). Therefore, is not optimized for frequently rewriting previously stored data. 2. A block chain by nature is linear.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Powered dAPP and Smart Contract Provider the Expanse™ Project [EXP] Launches New Revolutionary Platform, Borderless.Tech™
item.description:
Cryptocurrency Powered dAPP and Smart Contract Provider the Expanse™ Project [EXP] Launches New Revolutionary Platform, Borderless.Tech™

July 14, 2016 WASHINGTON, NC. - The Expanse Project, released a proof of concept version of its revolutionary decentralized governance services platform, Borderless.Tech. Borderless.tech is a coalition of globally accessible governance services forged out of smart contracts housed on the Expanse blockchain.

item.title: CryptoDrop Stops Ransomware Attacks And Minimizes File Loss
item.description:
CryptoDrop Stops Ransomware Attacks And Minimizes File Loss

Detecting cyber threats at an early stage can prevent the majority of damage from being done. A group of academics cobbled together an early-warning system for ransomware attacks. Generic systems were already available to major operating systems, but they are all rather easy to bypass.

item.title: Bitcoin Service Bitwala Partners ShapeShift to Enable Altcoin Transfers Globally
item.description:
Bitcoin Service Bitwala Partners ShapeShift to Enable Altcoin Transfers Globally

Bitwala, a crypto-to-SEPA service that allows fiat currency transfers towards settlements from users who pay in bitcoin, ether and other crypto, has teamed with ShapeShift.io to allow customers to make payments, transfer funds and top up their debit cards using altcoins in addition to bitcoin.

item.title: Joe Rogan Experience - The 4th Bitcoin Episode - September 7th LIVE * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Joe Rogan Experience - The 4th Bitcoin Episode - September 7th LIVE * /r/Bitcoin

Bitcoin is the currency of the Internet: a distributed, worldwide, decentralized digital money. Unlike traditional currencies such as dollars, bitcoins are issued and managed without any central authority whatsoever: there is no government, company, or bank in charge of Bitcoin. As such, it is more resistant to wild inflation and corrupt banks.

item.title: Steemit Website Hacked, CEO Promises to Reset Accounts in 48 Hours
item.description:
Steemit Website Hacked, CEO Promises to Reset Accounts in 48 Hours

Steemit announced on their website that they were hacked. The attack, according to them, has compromised about 260 accounts. A little less than US$ 85,000 worth of Steem Dollars and Steem are reported to have been taken by the attackers.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Today's Scalp Strategy - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Today's Scalp Strategy - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. We are heading in to the close of the week, and it's time to take a penultimate look at the bitcoin price.
